1.title: The Sanctum
1.plot: Vast returns for season 2! A crew of aliens tries to prevent all-out war in a dangerous, uncharted quadrant of space in a live-streaming sci-fi adventure. GM: Jackson Lanzing.

2.title: Ghost Ride the Whip
2.plot: The Brightest Eye begins their foray into season 2 of VAST! A message has summoned two individuals from the Pac-Ha Peacekeep to treat with the queen. Find out what happens next... right now!

4.title: Trust But Vrerify

5.title: Sojourner
5.plot: Welcome to VAST, the space exploration RPG hosted by Jackson Lanzing! Last episode was like Mad Max and the Fast and the Furious had a baby and it was awesome... so find out what happens next right NOW!

6.title: The Promise
6.plot: Amy Vorpahl returns as a guest for this episode of VAST! Colin reveals his winner for the photoshop contest and the journey of The Brightest Eye continues!

7.title: The Terran Intervention, Pt.1

9.title: Fathers
9.plot: Earth is under threat by its own first minister, planning an attack at a major event. To thwart his plan, the party split into groups to engage as a diplomatic envoy and keep him distracted. With his plan thwarted, The Brightest Eye continue their adventures!

10.title: Parasites
10.plot: The crew of the Avalon head to the beleaguered Xocotol homeworld to help combat a deadly and terrifying infection.

11.title: The Crime Gods of Olas
11.plot: Separated from the rest of The Screaming Valor's crew, Rayk and Louvin journey to the criminal world of Olas seeking information on Kazakuul.

12.title: The Great Experiment, Pt.1
12.plot: On a dead world in husk space, the crews of the Avalon and the Screaming Valor encounter new allies and old enemies.

13.title: The Great Experiment, Pt.2
13.plot: Kazakuul puts his ultimate plan into action as the crews of the Avalon, Screaming Valor and their allies race to stop him.

1.title: Into the Eye
1.plot: On her first mission as commanding officer of the Avalon, Captain Lucy Bard heads an interdiction mission to settle a dispute between two Peacekeep species over an unsettled planet. Following the outcome of the interdiction mission, the Pac-Ha send the Avalon on a secret and potentially dangerous mission - rendezvous with a Cyryn vessel and trade for an important Brightest Eye asset.

2.title: The Primal Scream
2.plot: Prologue: Five years ago, the crew of the Obliterating Fire stand fast as the last line of defense against the onslaught on the Vrerhoard in the Battle of Limbworld. Main Story: Visionary Destroyer is tasks with the retrieval of an important Brightest Eye asset - the Heretic. He and the crew of the Screaming Valor head out across the Slate in a desperate attempt to recover the Heretic and save the Brightest Eye.

3.title: The Vast and the Furious
3.plot: With the Slate encroaching on Brightest Eye space, the crew of the Avalon is dispatched to offer them assistance, but they are sent into turmoil when they are unexpectedly sent at Crossing speed through the Slate. They find themselves stranded with no ship systems online, but the Brightest Eye is not the only the only threat they must face.

4.title: The Corsairs
4.plot: Following the Crossing signature of the Peacekeep vessel believe to possess the Heretic, the Screaming Valor happen across a stricken Cyryn freighter asking for help. Not is all as it seems, and the Screaming Valor comes under attack from a group of well-coordinated pirates.

5.title: Gunboat Diplomacy
5.plot: Following the murder of the resident Pac-Ha on board the Avalon, the ship is recalled to Kirae. Captain Bard and her crew are tasked to engage in negotiations with the Dieikae, alongside and against a representative of the Cyryn Ventures, for an information sharing agreement.

6.title: Third Arm Stellar Survival Directory, Pt.1
6.plot: Following the information gained from the Dieikae Index, the Avalon heads to Cyryn 7-20 to investigate he source of a strange Slate-related radiation. Hot on their heels, the Screaming Valor catches up with them above the planet and engages them in battle. A strange flash of light sends the crew of both ships down to the surface where they must deal with dinosaurs, strange facilities, and most dangerous of all - each other.

7.title: Third Arm Stellar Survival Directory, Pt.2
7.plot: The crew of both the Avalon and the Screaming Valor are forced to work together to survive on the strange planet they have been stranded on. One group is hurtled through a series of Earth events, another battles dinosaurs and each other, whilst the third investigate the mysterious Third Arm Stellar Survival Directory and attempt to unlock its secrets.

8.title: The Cyryn Contract
8.plot: After been hurtled hundreds of light years by the explosion of Hoss Claw Firstworld, the Screaming Valor finds itself without power, 98% of the ships systems, and the ships pilot, but with prize of the very dangerous Tongue know as the Heretic. The crew are rescued by a familiar (to some) face, Ghasca Ueno, and are employed by her in return for the repair of their ship. The crew travel to Cyryn Prime, where they are embroiled in political machinations, subterfuge, and assassination attempts whilst trying to protect Ghasca Ueno and return their prize to the Brightest ...

9.title: Force Majeure
9.plot: The Avalon recovers from being hurtled through space after the destruction of Cyryn 7-20, minus their science officer This Might Be a Good Idea, but with the addition of an unintended stowaway - Noble Defender. Instead of allowing the Avalon to retrieve their lost crew member, the Pac-Ha order the Avalon to Thoreceus where a humanitarian crisis is underway. New and old crew members are forced to work together to safeguard the local species, whilst the mystery of Sira's past catches up with her.

10.title: The Hunted and the Dying
10.plot: On their way back to the Brightest Eye, the Screaming Valor is lured into the Bastion Nebula where they encounter an ancient Ta'al Klee facility emitting anti-Slate radiation. The crew embark on an exploratory mission into the Ta'al Klee basilica, only to be attacked by an ancient yet familiar foe.

11.title: Links
11.plot: Rayk's worm in the Pac-Ha system uncovers a video hidden deep in the data files. The video reveals information about the Avalon's newest crew member, but also potential clues as to the origin of the galaxy-devouring Slate.

12.title: Finale Pt.1 - The Truth
12.plot: With the assistance of their new companion, Fractal Bright, the crew of the Avalon delve deep into Pac-Ha technology to discover information about the Slate. Meanwhile, the Screaming Valor rendezvous on the edge of Brightest Eye space with their escort, but their welcome home does not go as expected.

13.title: Finale pt.2 - Concordance
13.plot: With the arrival of the Ashland, the crews of the Avalon and the Screaming Valor have to work together to avoid certain destruction, as well as ensure to future of the universe for all.

14.title: Tales from Vast - The Battle of Farmworld
14.plot: During the VAST off-season, Jackson Lanzing and our crews recount "Tales from VAST," a collection of ideas for storylines, treasons, and plots!

15.title: Tales from Vast - The Old Wizard in the New Forest
15.plot: During the VAST off-season, Jackson Lanzing and our crews recount "Tales from VAST," a collection of ideas for storylines, treasons, and plots!

16.title: Tales from Vast - The Rampel Gambit
16.plot: Tales from Vast continue as this week, we go 150 years back into the history of Tera. It's The Rampel Gambit!

17.title: Tales from Vast - The Box
17.plot: This week on VAST, Jackson Lanzing presents more Tales from VAST! This episode is about... The Box, with Collin Kelly!

imdb.plot outline: In 2025, the Earth was destroyed by an interstellar natural disaster known as "the Slate". But humans live on. For with the Slate, came our first contact with an alien intelligence -- the Pac Ha. This ancient and powerful race appeared in the sky at our darkest hour and saved us. They moved us to Terra, a new homeworld under the protection of their Peacekeep forces. We were the new kids on the block in a galactic community filled with strange aliens and advanced technology. We had a lot to learn. One hundred and eighty years later, across the galaxy, the Slate has begun to close in on the most dangerous civilization the Peacekeep has ever known, The Brightest Eye. The two galactic powers suddenly find themselves on a collision course.
imdb.title: Vast
plot: VAST is a science fiction role playing game show created and gamemastered by Jackson Lanzing. It's a space adventure that follows two different starship crews, playing on alternating weeks.

In 2025, the Earth was destroyed by an interstellar natural disaster known as "the Slate". But humans live on. For with the Slate, came our first contact with an alien intelligence -- the Pac Ha. This ancient and powerful race appeared in the sky at our darkest hour and saved us. They moved us to Terra, a new homeworld under the protection of their Peacekeep forces. We were the new kids on the block in a galactic community filled with strange aliens and advanced technology. We had a lot to learn. One hundred and eighty years later, across the galaxy, the Slate has begun to close in on the most dangerous civilization the Peacekeep has ever known, The Brightest Eye. The two galactic powers suddenly find themselves on a collision course.
